home.description: We believe in the transformative power of medicine to improve lives and foster well-being. As pioneers in healthcare innovation, we are dedicated to providing cutting-edge solutions that empower individuals to live their best lives.
home.generosityMessage: Every day, countless individuals around the world struggle to afford essential medication. Your generosity can change that.

description.rareMedicine: The Rare Medicine Request feature enables users to request uncommon medications through a simple form, automatically populating their profile details and supporting both English and Arabic languages. It ensures efficient handling of requests with immediate feedback and confirmation.
description.medical_tests: Access your medical test results with ease. Upload your test reports, and within moments, you'll have your results at your fingertips.
description.prescription: Upload your prescription by simply taking a photo or directly uploading it. Once uploaded, our system instantly converts the prescription into digital text then you will see the medicine you want or it's alternative.
description.donation: If you want to support those in need who are unable to afford their medications, you can now donate funds securely through our platform using Visa.

about.title: About Elagi
about.description: Welcome to Elagi, your premier destination for high-quality healthcare products delivered right to your doorstep. At Elagi, we're committed to providing you with convenient access to a wide range of medicines, supplements, wellness products, and more, all at competitive prices.

help.title: Help/Frequently Answered Questions
help.faq1_question: How long does it take for orders to be delivered?
help.faq1_answer: The delivery time for your order may vary depending on factors such as your location and the shipping method selected.
help.faq2_question: What payment methods do you accept?
help.faq2_answer: We accept major credit and debit cards, including Visa, MasterCard, American Express, and Discover. We also offer Cash on Delivery (COD) for select locations.
help.faq3_answer: [Elagi Pharmacy] gift cards and promotional vouchers are accepted. Enter your gift card or voucher code at checkout to apply it to your order.
help.faq4_question: Can I track my order once it's been placed?
help.faq4_answer: Currently, our online pharmacy does not offer an online order tracking feature. However, our customer service team can provide updates upon request.

content.user_eligibility: Users must be at least 18 years of age and legally eligible to enter binding contracts to register and order from Elagi Pharmacy. All information provided during registration must be accurate and truthful. Users are responsible for maintaining the confidentiality of their account information and password.
content.prescription_policy: Prescription drugs require a valid prescription issued by a licensed healthcare provider. Users must submit an accurate and valid prescription for all orders of prescription medications. Elagi Pharmacy reserves the right to verify the authenticity of the prescription with the prescribing healthcare provider.
content.product_info: Elagi Pharmacy endeavors to provide accurate and up-to-date product information. However, we cannot guarantee the availability of any product listed on the website. Prices and availability are subject to change without notice.
content.order_shipping: Orders are processed and shipped according to the shipping method selected at checkout. Shipping fees and delivery estimates are provided at the time of order. Orders cannot be changed or canceled once they have been processed.
content.returns_refunds: Returns are accepted only for damaged or incorrect items received, and must be reported within [X] days of delivery. Prescription medications are not eligible for return due to regulatory restrictions. For eligible returns, please contact customer service to initiate the return process.
content.privacy_policy: Elagi Pharmacy is committed to protecting your privacy. Our Privacy Policy, which is incorporated into these Terms and Conditions by reference, outlines how we collect, use, and protect your information.
content.law_compliance: Users agree to comply with all applicable laws and regulations in their jurisdiction, including those pertaining to the purchase and use of medications from Elagi Pharmacy. It is the user's responsibility to ensure compliance with their local laws.
